que: while showing a customer their incident form, they ask to change the priority field title to display their internal terminology Pvalue. how would you do that? choose two answers?

right click on priority and select configure label
right click on priority and select configure display settings
right click on priority and select configure column
explaination:
right click on priority and select configure dictionary
right click on priority and select configure label

what controls the publishing and retiring process for knowledge articles?

opt: Improves data quality, as the CIs will automatically be related when CMDB is activated.
it prevents users from relating CIs incorrectly.
it automates the loading of the ci dependency view.
makes relating CIs easier, because predefined relationship suggests which type of CIs should be
explaination: makes relating CIs easier, because predefined relationship suggests which type of CIs should be

que: when using the CI dependency view, how would you view the relationship between one CI and another CI?
opt: Click on the plus to expand cluster

what table acts as a staging area for records imported from a data source?
which field (or fields) is used as a unique key during imports?
what module enables an administrator to define destinations for imported data on any ServiceNow table?
the customer wants all users to have access to the records in the offerings table. what setting on access control definition would you use to grant access to all of the offering table records?

a manager wants to review a snapshot of month end sales performance data, as compared to sales target. in addition, the manager wants to able to see those monthly numbers trended overtime and forecasted into the future. what capability do you suggest for this manager?
opt: schedule reports, accustoms snapshot table and projection report
scheduled reports, a custom snapshot table and a trend report.

que: which component of a table contains a piece of data for one record?

what section on the notes tab shows the history of the work documented on the record?
Your customer wants to update a notification, so it is sent to the caller and also to the manager of the caller. how would you approach this requirement?
opt: Set who will receive to subscribable
on the send to tab, add caller field, dot walk to caller’s manager to add manager.
Create workflow and include a notification in the workflow
on who will receive tab, select copy manager checkbox.
on who will receive tab, add caller field, dot walk to caller’s Manager to add managers.
explaination: on who will receive tab, add caller field, dot walk to caller’s Manager to add managers.

que: An IT User calls the service desk Because they need to work on task records. all they can see his self-service on their homepage when they log into the service now instance. what issue could explain this? choose two answers?
opt: their user record was not approved by their managers
that user account does not belong to any group which contains the ITIL role.
their user account is not logged in property
their user account does not have itil role
That user account failed LDAP authentication
explaination:
that user account does not belong to any group which contains the ITIL role.
their user account does not have itil role

using the module. system properties> my company. what branding options are available?
opt: banner image, banner text, colour scheme
company name, company logo, colour scheme

que: From form designer, how would you define a section, so it displays as a tab?
opt: Click the gear and check the tab option
add .tab to the end of the section name
add _tap to the end of the section name

que: When looking at a long list of records, you want to quickly filter, to show only those which have category of hardware. How might you do that?
opt: on breadcrumbs, click > icon, type hardware and click enter
right click on the magnifier, type hardware and click enter
click funnel icon, type hardware and click enter.
on the list, locate and right click on the value Hardware, select show matching
on the category column header, right click and select show > hardware.
explaination: on the list, locate and right click on the value Hardware, select show matching

que: groups are defined at what?
opt: a collection of subject matter experts

que: what is the best way to learn about performance analytics?
opt: schedule a demo with ServiceNow sales team
take a service now performance analytics course on now learning
activate the plugin on your production environment and start the default data collectors.
explaination: take a service now performance analytics course on now learning

que: A subject matter expert routinely receives task which have been worked by first and level support before receiving the assignment. what could you suggest, to make it easier for the expert to read only the work notes in the activity log?
opt: click contexts menu > work notes view
click funnel icon and select only work notes
click personalise icon and select activity stream
right click form header > form layout > add work note section
explaination: click funnel icon and select only work notes

que: for a customer’s inventory application, several inventory applications fields on a needed-on inventory ticket. this ticket will be assigned to inventory support team members. how would you start to implement this requirement?
opt: create inventory table as a new base table. then add inventory specification fields as needed.
create inventory table with the inventory specification fields. in create view between the inventory and task table.
create the inventory table with the inventory specification fields. then create many to many relationships between the inventory and the task table.
create inventory table as an extended table from the task table. then add the inventory specification fields, as needed.
explaination: create inventory table as an extended table from the task table. then add the inventory specification fields, as needed.

que: when using the report designer, it is best practice to make copy of an existing report then make modification to your copy of that report. when viewing the report inside the designer, how would you make a copy of the report?

click on the down triangle and select insert and stay
click on the properties tab and select save as
click on context menu and select insert and stay
click on the funnel icon and create copy
explaination: click on the down triangle and select insert and stay

there is a business rule, excluding bob Smith with from any approvals
the Bob Smith user account, does not have a manager specified
Bob Smith does not have a delegate set up on his account

improve ability to troubleshoot issues with the default update set
make it easier to identify and review changes
Make it easier for developers to organise their work
explaination:
reduce potential conflicts
make it easier to identify and review changes

opt: members of the acme managers group, and HR department, regardless of geography.
Employees of the ACME North America, who are members of HR department or the ACME managers group
members of the ACME Manager group, who are also members of HR departments and part of ACME North America
users which are members of either ACME North America, or HR department or ACME Managers group

A service catalog project will involve building 80 catalog items. for each of the catalog items, the following fields will be mandatory on the forms: requested for, requested by, approving manager, delivery instructions. all of the other variables will be specific to the individual catalog item. what features would you use when designing the catalog item form?
opt: create an order guide which includes all variables; then copy and hide variables as needed.
create one variable set for the four variables; then add the variable set to each of the eighty catalog items
create a variable set template; they apply to all of the catalog items
create a record producer that contains the four fields; then add to the record producer related list on the catalog items
create a floor designer action, with variable set data pill; then apply flow to all of the eighty catalog items
explaination: create one variable set for the four variables; then add the variable set to each of the eighty catalog items

que: what is the best practice regarding data imports?
opt: plan time before your import to remove obsolete or inaccurate data.
use extremely large import sets, instead of multiple large import sets.
adjust your transform maps, after the data is loaded into the target table
create a new import set table for each new data load
monitor data quality and clean imported data using the data scrub workspace
explaination: plan time before your import to remove obsolete or inaccurate data.

select source file; run auto map; transform data; clean up target table
set up LDAP; run auto map; transform data; clean up target table
explaination: Load the data; create transform map; transform data; clean up import table

opt: all rows are treated as new records, but error will be flagged in the import log
duplicate rows are rejected from the import
all rows are treated as new records. no existing records were updated
all rows or rejected from the import, as coalesce field is required
explaination: all rows are treated as new records. no existing records were updated

que: access controls are evaluated in this order: 1. Match Object against table ACL 2. Match The object against field ACL. Within step one above, what order are the table ACLs evaluated?
opt: general to specific: table ACL, table.field ACL, parent table. field ACL
specific to general: table.field ACL, parent table.field ACL, * Field ACL
top to bottom: wildcard table ACL, parent table ACL, table ACL
bottom to top: table ACL, table. field ACL, parent table. field ACL
specific to general: table ACL, parent table ACL, wildcard(*) ACL
explaination: general to specific: table ACL, table.field ACL, parent table. field ACL

tables within the existing application scope
tables within the global scope

a client script executes before a record is loaded and a business rule executes after
a client script executes on the client and a business rule executes on the server

base class table is not extended from another table. parent class tables may be extended from another table
base class tables always have tables extended from them. parent tables do not have tables extended from them
extended tables are always extended from parent tables. extended tables are usually extended from base tables

super incident table is a child table
task table is a child table
super incident table is a base table
task table is a parent table
incident table is a base table
task table is a base table
incident table is a parent table
incident table is a child table

task table is a parent table
task table is a base table
incident table is a parent table

que: On a filter condition, there is an element, which is based on the table, the user access rights, and column on the table. what is this element called?
which module would you use to customize your instance banner image, text and colours?
Which service now capability provides assistance to help users obtain information, make decisions and perform common work task via messaging interface?
service now contains over 25 different report types. what are some of the types? choose five answers?
On the CI dependency view, what enables you to trace from an infrastructure item, like a server, to the server that dependent on that server?
which one statement correctly describes access control rule evalution?
opt: roles are evaluated from the general to specific, so a table rule must be active to continue.
if a row level rule and a field level rule exist, both rules must be true before an operation is allowed
rules are evaluated using roles. the role with the most permissions evaluates the rules first
if more than one rules applies to a row, the older rule is evaluated first
explaination: if a row level rule and a field level rule exist, both rules must be true before an operation is allowed

que: Which one of the following describe the primary operations performed against tables in the service now platform?

free spokes are available in the ServiceNow store

que: when looking at a long list of records, you want to quickly filter, to show only those which have short description containing email. how might you do that?
opt: on search box, select text, type email, click enter
click list magnifier to expand column search, on short description, type email, click enter
click list magnifier to expand column search, on short description, type %email, click enter
click list magnifier to expand column search, on short description, type *email, click enter
explaination: click list magnifier to expand column search, on short description, type *email, click enter

que: a task worker asks how they can monitor any updates occurring to records assigned to him, like responses from customers. what do you suggest?
opt: on my work list, select activity stream icon to show a frame with live updates
select service desk> my work dashboard
open an agent workspace tab for each record he wants to monitor
click on the eyeglass icon to expand the monitor frame
explaination: on my work list, select activity stream icon to show a frame with live updates

que: you have an existing customer, who is using work floors for their catalog item. Existing purchasing policies to require approval for any request that totals over $1000. However, management wants to change the approval threshold to $1500. which workflow would you update to make this change?
after you create a new table, what is the best practice regarding the navigation pane? Choose 2 answers?
opt: create application menu with the same name as the table label
set the font style on both the application menu and the module
specify which roles are able to see the module
set the filter condition on the application module
Create module with the plural of the table label
specify which roles are able to see the application menu
explaination:
create application menu with the same name as the table label
Create module with the plural of the table label

ensures user has access to the fields in a table, before considering their access to

Two departments (HR onboarding and facilities) have come to you, asking for a way for employees to request event room setup services. The requirements are the same for the form and the task routing to the facilities assignment group. 1) For HR, the item will be used primarily for the onboarding condition, for employees orientation sessions. 2) for facilities, the item will be used for anyone in the company who needs room setup services. However, both departments have their own service catalogs. what do you do, to support these requirements?
opt: create one catalog item for event room setup; then use ACLs to control access.
create one catalog item for HR event room setup and one for facilities even room setup; then publish each to the appropriate catalog
create one catalog item for event room setup; then publish to the parent catalogue, which is accessible to both HR and facilities.
create one catalogue item for event room setup; then publish to both catalogs.

que: Which of the following is best practice when configuring assignment rules or predictive intelligence? (select 4)
opt: Setting an assignment group and user based on category and subcategory
Setting a user based on category and subcategory
Setting a user and assignment group based on short description
Setting an assignment group based on category and subcategory
explaination:
Setting an assignment group and user based on category and subcategory
Setting a user based on category and subcategory
Setting a user and assignment group based on short description
Setting an assignment group based on category and subcategory
